result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (3rd) and Operating w/ PAC (3rd). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (3rd) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (3rd) was dismissed by the court.

  • Brandon Donald Kessler was found guilty of OWI (3rd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Iron County Clerk of Circuit Court
Iron County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall pay $50 per month commencing February 1, 2017 and due the 1st of every month thereafter until paid in full.  Failure to make court ordered payments will result in termination of payment plan and all available enforcement actions will be taken without further notice.
Defendant is eligible for Good Time and Huber at the discretion of the ICS.  NOTE:  Effective 5/3/17, court deems defendant's jail obligation to end on 5/5/17 at 5:00 p.m.

Defendant shall contact the Iron County Sheriff's Department at (715) 561-2440 within 10 business days of sentencing to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample.  Defendant shall also pay the surcharge for same.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon Donald Kessler

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Brandon Donald Kessler in court, in custody.  Matthew J. Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case at 11:41 a.m.  Cites appearances.  Questions def.  on 16CM48, court deems sentence served at 5:00 p.m., Friday, May 5th.   On 17CM15, DA moves for dismissal.  Court grants.  Adj 11:43 p.m.  klr

records.descr: Order for intox driver assessment and safety plan

records.addlTxt: Defendant Brandon Donald Kessler in court with attorney Sam Joseph Filippo.   Matthew J. Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case at 1:20 p.m.  16TR325-330 also called.  Cites appearances and states agreement:  Offer made of plea GNC to Count 2 with penalties of $1200 inclusive, AODA and follow any recommendations, 24 month revoc of license, 24 month IID, 14 days ICJ with good time and Huber.  Has until 1/20/17 to report.  DA states background for 14 days jail.  Motion to dismiss all other counts and citations is granted by court.  Defendant pleads NC to Count #2.  No coercion.  Attorney Filippo is satisfied def freely pleads.  Court accepts plea and agreement as stated by DA.  Defendant is also to provide a DNA sample and pay surcharge.  Court orders def to pay $50 per month commencing February 1, 2017 until financial obligations are paid in full.  klr
Plea/sentencing hearing on January 10, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

Sam J. Filippo appeared on behalf of def.  Def appeared via phone.  Frederick j Schellgell appeared on behalf of the State of Wisconsin.  Case called at 11:40 a.m.  DA cites appearances and outlines agreement.  Def sworn in by court.  Filippo questions def.  DA requests adjournment.  Court grants adjournment for three weeks.  Defendant to be present in person.  If not present, court will issue warrant.  Adj.  11:49 a.m.  klr

ADDRESS INFO for Brandon Donald Kessler
Current: 5195 Hwy 51 N, Mercer, WI 54547   (Effective: 08-22-2016)
Prior: 5194 Hwy 51 N, Mercer, WI 54547
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 20, 2016 at 11:30 am.

Frederick j. Schellgell appears on behalf of the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case.  Nobody else present but spoke to Attorney Filippo prior to coming in to put case on the record.  Defendant is getting paperwork that DA requested.  One week adjournment requested.  Court grants adjournment.  klr

Defendant Brandon Donald Kessler in court with attorney Sam Joseph Filippo.  Frederick j Schellgell appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case, cites appearances.  Also calls 16TR325-330.  PTC was held.  Would like to come back in a week with paperwork for resolution of cases.  DA states what agreement will be but will be reduced to written agreement.  Court accepts agreement as stated.  Set in one week for PLEAS.  Court advises def that bond continues in meantime.  klr
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 6, 2016 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Brandon Donald Kessler
Current: 5194 Hwy 51 N, Mercer, WI 54547   (Effective: 08-22-2016)
Prior: 5195 Hwy 51 N, Mercer, WI 54547
Pre-trial conference on November 29, 2016 at 11:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on August 16, 2016 at 11:15 am.
Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency and Order

Defendant Brandon Donald Kessler in court.  Martin J. Lipske appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case.  Public defender information given to defendant again.  Indicates not eligible for public defender.  Court questions defendant re assets.  Determines def eligible for court-appointed attorney.  Court appoints Sam Filippo.  Orders defendant to reimburse for attorney fees.  Def to meet with attorney.  10:55 a.m.  Back on record with attorney Filippo present.  Complaint has been served, defendant waives reading and pleads not guilty to all counts.  To be scheduled for pretrial conference.  Bond to continue as established.  If citations, all cases to track together.  klr
Adjourned initial appearance on July 11, 2016 at 10:30 am.
NO ALCOHOL, NO BARS, NO ILLEGAL SUBSTANCES.
